class.name: PIXI.ImageLoader

parameters.name: crossorigin
parameters.help: Whether requests should be treated as crossorigin

class.help: The image loader class is responsible for loading images file formats ('jpeg', 'jpg', 'png' and 'gif')\nOnce the image has been loaded it is stored in the PIXI texture cache and can be accessed though PIXI.Texture.fromFrame() and PIXI.Sprite.fromFrame()\nWhen loaded this class will dispatch a 'loaded' event

public.name: load
public.help: Loads image or takes it from cache

public.name: loadFramedSpriteSheet
public.help: Loads image and split it to uniform sized frames

parameters.name: textureName
parameters.help: if given, the frames will be cached in <textureName>-<ord> format

private.name: onLoaded
private.help: Invoked when image file is loaded or it is already cached and ready to use

public.name: frames
public.help: if the image is loaded with loadFramedSpriteSheet\nframes will contain the sprite sheet frames
